parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total
is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

get.summary: DenomTrace queries a denomination trace information.

parameters.name: hash
parameters.description: hash (in hex format) of the denomination trace information.

get.summary: Params queries all parameters of the ibc-transfer module.

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total
is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.title:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageResponse.title:
PageResponse is to be embedded in gRPC response messages where the corresponding
request message has used PageRequest

path.description:
path defines the chain of port/channel identifiers used for tracing the source of the fungible
token.

base_denom.description: base denomination of the relayed fungible token.

ibc.transfer.DenomTrace.description:
DenomTrace contains the base denomination for ICS20 fungible tokens and the source tracing
information path.

send_enabled.description: send_enabled enables or disables all cross-chain token transfers from this chain.

receive_enabled.description: receive_enabled enables or disables all cross-chain token transfers to this chain.

ibc.transfer.Params.description:
Params defines the set of IBC transfer parameters.
NOTE: To prevent a single token from being transferred, set the TransfersEnabled parameter to
true and then set the bank module's SendEnabled parameter for the denomination to false.

denom_trace.description: denom_trace returns the requested denomination trace information.

ibc.transfer.QueryDenomTraceResponse.description: QueryDenomTraceResponse is the response type for the Query/DenomTrace RPC method.

denom_traces.description: denom_traces returns all denominations trace information.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

ibc.transfer.QueryDenomTracesResponse.description: QueryConnectionsResponse is the response type for the Query/DenomTraces RPC method.

params.description: params defines the parameters of the module.

ibc.transfer.QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.
